templates.name: The Ruler of Dubrovnik
templates.description: Transform into medieval royalty on Dubrovnik's ancient walls. Each generation creates a unique artwork - no two are the same!
templates.style: Medieval King/Queen on city walls with dramatic sunset over Adriatic Sea

templates.name: Westeros Trading Card
templates.description: Burst through an ancient trading card as a hardened Westerosi sellsword! Dynamic action scene with Dubrovnik as King's Landing in the background.
templates.style: Ultra-photorealistic Game of Thrones trading card with shattered frame, magical effects, and dramatic golden-hour lighting
